description: Main entry point and core source file for a Flutter-based bookstore transaction management app, containing implementations of API client, data models, providers for authentication and transactions, and UI screens including login, dashboard, transaction form, and profile.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A client for making authenticated API requests, reading base URL from environment variables, and including JWT tokens in headers if available.

classes.name: TransactionModel
classes.description: Data model representing a bookstore transaction with JSON serialization and copying features.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Manages user authentication state, persists JWT tokens and username, and provides login/logout methods.

classes.name: TransactionsProvider
classes.description: Manages loading, creating, updating, and deleting transaction records through backend API.

classes.name: BookstoreApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring theme and starting the app with providers.

classes.name: RootGate
classes.description: Determines whether to show login or main interface based on authentication status.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app scaffold with bottom navigation and page routing.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: UI screen for user login with input validation and state management.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays summary of transactions and list with options to edit or delete.

classes.name: ProfileScreen
classes.description: Shows user profile info with sign out option.

classes.name: TransactionFormScreen
classes.description: Form for creating or editing transactions, with date picker and validation.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, loads environment, initializes shared preferences and providers, and runs the app.

methods.name: ApiClient
methods.description: Constructor and methods for forming HTTP requests with authentication.

methods.name: TransactionModel.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a TransactionModel from JSON data.

methods.name: TransactionModel.toJson
methods.description: Converts a TransactionModel instance into JSON.

methods.name: AuthProvider.login
methods.description: Performs user login, stores JWT token and username upon success.

methods.name: AuthProvider.logout
methods.description: Clears stored JWT token and username.

methods.name: TransactionsProvider.fetchAll
methods.description: Loads all transactions from backend API.
